author: John Hanna / AP
title: Federal Judge Blocks Kansas’ Governor From Limiting Religious Gatherings During the COVID-19 Pandemic
description: A federal judge blocked Kansas from limiting attendance at religious worship services to 10 people or less to halt the spread of COVID-19.
content: (TOPEKA, Kan.) — A federal judge on Saturday blocked Kansas from limiting attendance at in-person religious worship services or activities to 10 people or fewer to check the spread of the coronavirus, signaling that he believes that it’s likely that the polic… [+4314 chars]
